duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform surgical procedures on the mouth, jaws, and teeth.
Administer anesthesia, interpret X-rays, and conduct other diagnostic tests.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Dental Medicine (DMD) or Doctor of Dental Surgery (DDS) degree from an accredited program.
Completed residency or fellowship training in Oral Surgery.
Board Certification by the American Board of Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery (ABOMS) is desirable.
